## Tools & Tech & Development

To complete this research we will need access to books about R and S. The books Statistical models in S (1992), Mixed-Effects Models in S and S-PLUS (2009), Regression Modeling Strategies (2013), An R and S-Plus Companion to Applied Regression (2002), and Modern Applied Statistics with S (2002) are all candidates and there may be others.
